# Problem 1

Add parentheses to the following lambda terms so that the grouping of sub-terms becomes explicit. For example, the term $\lambda x.x \lambda y.y$ with parentheses is $\lambda x.(x (\lambda y.y))$.

## a)

\[\lambda x.\lambda y.\lambda z.x y z\]
\[\lambda x.(\lambda y.(\lambda z.((x y) z)))\]
